title: ITC Hotels expands presence in South India, signs  Welcomhotel Madikeri
description: ITC Hotels signs management agreement with Narne Hotels to expand Welcomhotel brand in South India. The 150-key hotel in Madikeri, Karnataka showcases ITC Hotels' expertise in hospitality and regional cuisine. Madikeri offers green valleys, coffee plantations, spice trails, and the rare Neelakurinji flower.
